name: Equinox Arena Main Menu Prototype
description:
When the stars are in opposition, where will you stand?

Equinox Arena is a fighting game UX/UI study, aimed at taking a genre that is notoriously difficult for newcomers to learn and making it more accessible without sacrificing the depth that veteran players seek out. This prototype contains the main menu flow for the project.

To see more of the process that went into this prototype, check out my Artstation!
